title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 January 2023. 

(3) These Regulations and the European Union (Packaging) Regulations 
2014 to 2020 may be cited together as the European Union (Packaging) 
Regulations 2014 to 2022 and shall be construed together as one. 

Definition

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
heading: 4. Regulation 10 of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
4. Regulation 10 of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following paragraph after paragraph (4): 

“(5) On and from the date of the coming into operation of the European 
Union (Packaging) (Amendment) Regulations 2022, a major producer shall be 
a member of an approved body.”. 

Amendment of Regulation 17(1) of Principal Regulations

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
heading: 6. Regulation 26 of the Principal Regulations is amended –
text_raw:
6. Regulation 26 of the Principal Regulations is amended – 

(a) 

by substituting the following paragraph for paragraph (1): 

“(1) 
It is hereby prescribed that the register maintained by a 
local authority under section 19 of the Act shall contain entries 
specifying the giving of a notice under regulation 25.”, and 

(b) 

in paragraph (2), by substituting “regulation 26” for “regulations 
13, 15 and 26”.

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
heading: 8. Notwithstanding the coming into operation of these Regulations, any
text_raw:
8. Notwithstanding the coming into operation of these Regulations, any 
proceedings initiated, or criminal prosecutions instituted, under the Principal 
Regulations may be continued as if the amendments and revocations in these 
Regulations had not been made and any order made, or fine or penalty 
imposed, shall have effect accordingly. 

Revocations
text_norm: 8 notwithstanding coming operation regulation proceeding initiated criminal prosecution instituted principal regulation may continued amendment revocation regulation made order made fine penalty imposed shall effect accordingly revocation

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
heading: 9. The following provisions of the Principal Regulations are revoked:
text_raw:
9. The following provisions of the Principal Regulations are revoked: 

(a) 

regulations 12, 13, 14, 15 and 16; 

(b) Parts 1, 2 and 3 of Schedule 2; 

(c) Schedule 3 (amended by Regulation 15 of the European Union 
(Packaging) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 322 of 
2020)). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 December, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Packaging)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Packaging) Regulations 2014 
to 2020 to remove self-compliance as an option under those Regulations.
